20101201182547.667|20101201182549.333|CCO|EVERY ONE PERSON STARTING

20101201182553.000|20101201182555.000|CCO|FACTS.
20101201182555.000|20101201182557.000|CCO|33 MILLION PEOPLE WORLDWIDE ARE 
20101201182557.000|20101201182559.000|CCO|INFECTED WITH HIV.

20101201182601.000|20101201182602.667|CCO|IS DOWN FROM 3.1 MILLION IN 
20101201182602.667|20101201182604.333|CCO|1999.
20101201182604.333|20101201182606.000|CCO|THERE WERE 1.8 MILLION AIDS 
20101201182606.000|20101201182607.667|CCO|DEATHS IN 2009 AND THAT IS 
20101201182607.667|20101201182609.333|CCO|COMPARED TO A LITTLE OVER 2 
20101201182609.333|20101201182611.000|CCO|MILLION IN 2004.

20101201182613.000|20101201182615.000|CCO|INFECTED SINCE THE START OF THE 
20101201182615.000|20101201182617.000|CCO|EPIDEMIC IN THE 1980s.
